General.Name: Summa Silver Corp
General.Description: Summa Silver Corp., a mineral exploration stage company, engages in acquiring, exploring, and evaluating natural resource properties in the United States. The company holds a 100% interest in the Hughes property located in central Nevada. It also has an option to earn a 100% interest in the Mogollon Property located in New Mexico. The company was formerly known as Pinnacle North Gold Corp. and changed its name to Summa Silver Corp. in April 2020. Summa Silver Corp. was incorporated in 2018 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1030 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 2Y3
